events.message: I ordered a package two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and there's no update on the tracking page.
Identified the issue as a delivery delay based on the customer's report of the package not arriving on time.
Assigned the case to a customer service representative specializing in delivery and shipping issues.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. Let me check the status for you.
Could you please provide your order number or tracking ID so I can look into the shipping details and see why it might be delayed?
Sure, my order number is 45783910. I checked the tracking link again but it still says 'in transit' without any updates.
Thank you for the info. I’ve contacted the courier service, and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. Your package should arrive within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the update, but this delay is inconvenient. Please keep me informed if the delivery timeline changes again.
Understood, I will monitor your shipment and update you promptly if there are any further delays. Thank you for your patience.
Checking in to confirm your package has arrived safely. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Closing this case as the delivery issue appears to be resolved. Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
